alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Moore; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:00AM EST until January 03 at 6:45AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Moore County in central North Carolina... Scotland County in central North Carolina... Harnett County in central North Carolina... Eastern Richmond County in central North Carolina... Cumberland County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... Hoke County in central North Carolina... * Until 645 AM EST. * At 559 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Hoffman to near Dunbar, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Sanford, Laurinburg, Southern Pines, Raeford, Lillington, Carthage, Fort Bragg, Pinehurst and Dunn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Lee; Moore; Richmond; Scotland
